document.full_text: a week ago, the new york rangers anxiously waited to see if they would get into the stanley cup playoffs. now that they've made it, they hope to stay longer.
document.title: rangers back home, look to cut into caps' 2-0 lead
lines_and_colors: a week ago, the new york rangers anxiously waited to see if they would get into the stanley cup playoffs. now that they've made it, they hope to stay longer.
